metadata.title: CVE-2024-35195 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Requests is a HTTP library. Prior to 2.32.0, when making requests through aRequests `Session`, if the first request is made with `verify=False` todisable cert verification, all subsequent requests to the same host willcontinue to ignore cert verification regardless of changes to the value of`verify`. This behavior will continue for the lifecycle of the connectionin the connection pool. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.32.0.

criterions.comment: requests package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
python-pip package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
